desc.p: Use help or refer to the man pages for the correct syntax.

error.help: %s is a file, not a directory.

desc.p: Review the file/line number in the error messages.
Check the path and/or file name.

error.help: Package %s: Whitespace not allowed in Names: %s

desc.p: Remove spaces or tabs from names.

error.help: Package %s: Slash is not allowed in Names: %s

desc.p: Remove the slash from the name.

error.help: Package %s: Reserved word null found in Name.

desc.p: Do not use null as a Name.

error.help: Package %s: Reserved word %s from %s found in Name.

desc.p: Do not use reserved words as Names.
The function checkName() is being called with a null string.
Unable to create file due to security exception.
Unable to create file due to IO exception.
Unable to close file due to IO exception.
Please create the directory before referencing it.

error.help: Application variable interface_delimiter is not allowed in Names: %s

desc.p: Remove the interface_delimiter from the name.
